title: 2 Bed/1.5 Bath charming townhomes available!
posting_body: ['Tuscana Townhomes', '2 bed/1.5 bath 872sq.', 'Available now!', '*Assigned Parking & Garage option to rent', '*Ceiling Fan with Ambiance Lighting', '*Central Heating and Air Conditioning', '*Convenient Freeway Access', '*Covered Patios', '*Direct Access Garages Available*', '*Distinctive Mediterranean Tuscan Exteriors', '*Dual Master Suites', '*Extra Storage Space*', '*Granite Kitchen Counter tops', '*Granite Vanity Tops in Baths', '*High Efficiency Washer and Dryer', '*High Grade Granite Counter Tops', '*Interior Laundry Area Including Washer/Dryer', '*Open Concept Floor Plans', '*Outdoor Barbeque Grilling Stations', '*Pet Friendly, Large Breed Pets Accepted', '*Pleasing Park-like Setting w/ Landscaped Entrances', '*Private Patio or Balcony for Each Home', '*Spacious 2 & 3 Bedroom Luxury Townhomes', '*Stainless Steel Kitchen Appliance Packages', '*Stainless Steel Kitchen Appliances & Granite', '*Sweeping Panoramic and Courtyard Views', '*Upgraded Carpeting and Hardwood Style Flooring', '*Washers & Dryers', '*Wood Style Flooring Throughout', 'Tuscana offers spacious 2 & 3 bedroom luxury townhomes in the heart of Tracy, CA.', 'Our community floor plans were inspired by the Hillside Villages of Italy.', 'Tuscana provides residents the ideal location and a carefree lifestyle with shopping, fine dining, and the ACE train just moments away.', 'Our tuscan style townhomes come standard with custom cabinets, upgraded carpeting, wood style flooring, granite countertops, stainless steel kitchen appliances, washer and dryer, garages, ceiling fans, rainfall shower heads and lush community landscaping throughout.', 'Enjoy our outdoor grilling stations with private seating area with a tuscan flare.', 'Come experience the life you deserve at Tuscana luxury townhomes in Tracy, CA.', 'A $99.00 holding fee is required to hold the unit.', 'The holding deposit is not refundable after 3 days.', 'A nonrefundable application fee of $35.00 per person over the age of 18 is required.', '3 x the rent is required with verifiable income.', 'Utilities are not included.', 'Renter’s insurance is required.']
